p: Two cases of fatal encephalitis with HCoV-OC43 infection were reported in 2 immunosuppressed infants (9-month old infant on chemotherapy for leukemia and 11-month boy with severe combined immunodeficiency). [ 15, 16] Moreover, acute disseminated encephalomyelitis(ADEM) was reported with HCoV-OC43 infection in a 15-year-old boy. In this case, CSF was positive for the virus. [ 17] In 2015, acute flaccid paralysis was reported in a 3-year-old girl after infection with HCoV 229E and OC43 [ 18] In another study by Li Y et al. [ 19] from China, CoV was suggested as an important cause of acute encephalitis-like syndrome in children.
